reviews.review: Só tenta não surtar jogando competitivo
shit as always, but still old and gold

This is objectively the best competitive game on the market. And that comes from a player that actually isnt too much into CS. But if you like skill based competitve modern day military shooters this is the game for you.
CSGO es un buen juego, uno de los mejores para mi!

Už delší dobu hraju Csgo a před aktulizací která změnila CSGO aby jsme museli mít prime aby jsme mohli hrát oficialní zapasi tak je to docela super protože už tak tyden sem nepotkal žadneho cheatera i když možna typci měli soft aim ale tak to je ješte v pohode narozdíl od onetap.
One of the best FPS games , even if the cheaters ruin it.
